mapper.select: SELECT t.rank, t."bookId", t."bookCateNm", t."bookCateDepth", t."bookName", t."bookDesc", t."author", t."roleId", t."cateId", t."writer", t."bookImgPath" FROM ( SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER (PARTITION BY b."bookCateNm" ORDER BY b."bookId" DESC) AS rank, b.* FROM book b ) t WHERE t.rank <= 8
